snippet: A sell-off in Apple weighed on technology stocks. But European markets were heartened by news of a possible cease-fire agreement in Ukraine.
abstract: Slide in Apple and other technology stocks steers stock market to small loss, but news of possible cease-fire between Ukraine and Russia bolsters European markets.
lead_paragraph: A sell-off in Apple weighed on technology stocks. But European markets were heartened by news of a possible cease-fire agreement in Ukraine.

headline.main: Tech Shares Lead Nasdaq Lower in Quiet Day of Trading
headline.print_headline: Tech Shares Lead Nasdaq Lower in Quiet Day of Trading
